channel.title: Night Light InfoSec
channel.description: Recent content on Night Light InfoSec

item.title: First Post
item.description: WELCOME Hello and welcome! I’m glad you’re here and hope that you find value in what I write and post here. If you want more information about me, please check out my About page. I’m going to leave this short since I’m still developing all of this! Thanks for visiting!

ABOUT ME I’m a SOC analyst trying to learn new things. I had been thinking about creating a website for myself, but could never seem to come up with a good name. Then one night after putting my kids to bed, I looked over at their nightlight and thought about all the times I have stayed up studying after putting them to bed. I immediately checked to see if the name was registered, and that’s how NightlightInfoSec.
